mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review_comment (review_id, member_id, cm_content, cm_createdAt, cm_modiefiedAt) VALUES (#{review_id}, #{member_id}, #{cm_content}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update review_comment set cm_content = #{cm_content} where cm_id = #{cm_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.delete: delete from review_comment where cm_id = #{cm_id} and member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.select: SELECT review_comment.*, member.nickname FROM review_comment left JOIN member ON review_comment.member_id = member.member_id WHERE review_comment.review_id = #{review_id}
